definitions.definition: A religious community whose members live under strict observation of religious rules and self-imposed vows .
The buildings and pertaining surroundings in which such a community lives .

subdefinitions.definition: Synonym of nunnery , a female religious community and its residence .

definitions.definition: A gathering of people lasting several days for the purpose of discussing or working on topics previously selected.

main_definition: A religious community whose members live under strict observation of religious rules and self-imposed vows .
secondary_definitions: The buildings and pertaining surroundings in which such a community lives .
A gathering of people lasting several days for the purpose of discussing or working on topics previously selected.
